column5: Just off the Nebo Scenic Loop sits the Devil’s Kitchen. This location features an amazing trail and scenic overlook that displays the various formations of the Devil’s Kitchen.
column6: A dazzling display of red rocks weathered into spires and hoodoos.
column7: ['Tintic Standard Reduction Mill', 'Dream Mine', 'Sinclair Gas Station']
column8: Nebo Loop Rd Payson, Utah, 84651 United States
